usefulItems: frying pan, egg rings, large bowl
title: Crumpets

ingredients.content: vegetable oil, to grease and fry

preparations.content: Place milk into mixing bowl and heat <b>2 min/105°F/speed 1<b>.
Add flour, yeast, salt, and sugar and mix <b>20 sec/speed 3<b>. Let rest in mixing bowl 10 minutes. Meanwhile, grease a large bowl and set aside.
Add water and baking soda and knead <b>2 min/<b>. Transfer to prepared bowl and let rest 30 minutes.

Lightly grease a frying pan and set over a low to medium heat. Grease the inside of egg rings and arrange in frying pan. Once rings are hot, spoon ⅓ cup batter into each ring. Cook 4-5 minutes until bubbles pop and batter is mostly cooked. Lift off the rings, turn crumpets over and cook a further 1 minute. Re-grease and reheat the rings and frying pan before cooking the next batch of crumpets. Serve Crumpets while still warm, spread generously with butter and jam  (see Tip).

hintsAndTricks: If making in advance, re-heat crumpets by toasting lightly on both sides before serving.
